DOC.brief_summary: The project consist two study want throw light importance physical activity/exercise maintain physical function among cancer patient whose disease responsive curative treatment . Study I randomise intervention study want study effect adjust physical exercise compare usual care . In study II main aim validate different subjective objective method measure physical functioning
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Functioning Palliative Cancer Patients - Clinical Randomised Trial
DOC.criteria: Palliative cancer patient , life expectancy 3 12 month , Karnofsky status equally 60 , pain score equal 3 numerical rating scale ( 010 ) , cognitive function intact
